channel.title: Robert Wood Johnson Foundation on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Robert Wood Johnson Foundation on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: In Case Of Emergency
item.description: Today in Tedium: Of all the things William Shatner has done in his career—captain of the starship USS Enterprise, veteran police officer, totally-game muse for Ben Folds, fairly good tweeter for being 86 years old—the one thing that’s stuck with me the most is his years on Rescue 911, the early reality show that was America’s Most Wanted (mostly) without the crime and Unsolved Mysteries with the solutions laid out clear as day.
